documentation.content:
[View JobSet details](https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/aiml/deployments/jobset/${PROJECT_ID}/${CLUSTER_KIND}/${CLUSTER_LOCATION}/${CLUSTER_NAME}/${NAMESPACE}/${JOBSET_NAME}/observability?project=${PROJECT_ID}).
- The likelihood of Out-Of-Memory (OOM) failures and container restarts increase when the memory usage of the workload nears the total requested memory of its containers. [View Documentation](https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/containers-kubernetes/kubernetes-best-practices-resource-requests-and-limits).
- If alerts tend to be false positive or noisy, consider visiting the alert policy page and changing the threshold, the rolling (alignment) window, and the retest (duration) window. [View Documentation](https://cloud.google.com/monitoring/alerts/concepts-indepth)

conditions.displayName: Memory Request Utilization is high for: ${JOBSET_NAME}

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_utilization" AND resource.labels.project_id="${PROJECT_ID}" AND resource.labels.cluster_name="${CLUSTER_NAME}" AND resource.labels.location="${CLUSTER_LOCATION}" AND resource.labels.namespace_name="${NAMESPACE_NAME}" AND metadata.user_labels."jobset.sigs.k8s.io/jobset-name"="${JOBSET_NAME}"
